About universAAL Context Suite

The set of artefacts defining the universAAL context tools.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
universAAL Context CHE - Context History Entrepot The component managing the history of all context events published to the context bus.
universAAL Context CHE - Context History Entrepot for Mobile The mobile version of the component managing the history of all context events published to the PERSONA context bus.
universAAL Context CHE - Module for Sesame store with cardinality This is a bundle fragment module for ctxt.che. It allows the usage of additional store engines enabling cardinality reasoning, confidence and encryption
universAAL Context Sesame SAIL for OWL Lite Sesame SAIL that realizes the cardinality of properties, according to OWL Lite
universAAL Context Situation Reasoner -
universAAL Context Profiling Server universAAL Profiling server providing services for profile edition
universAAL Context Space Server -
universAAL Context Reliability Reasoner The component that uses SPARQL to use situation reasoning on the detected fault events.
universAAL Context Drools Reasoner The Drools based reasoner
universAAL Context System Information Provider Publishes information about status of the Space as Context events.
universAAL Karaf Feature for Context The set of artefacts defining the universAAL context tools.
